article:
This is a complete 'list of the [[U.S. state|states of the United States]] and
its major [[Territories of the United States|territories]]' ordered by total
area, land area, and water area. The water area figures include inland, coastal,
Great Lakes, and territorial waters. Glaciers and intermittent water features
are counted as land area. [http://www.census.gov/geo/www/tiger/glossry2.pdf
Census 2000 Geographic Terms and Concepts], Census 2000 Geography Glossary, U.S.
Census Bureau. Accessed 2007-07-10 __TOC__
categories: Lists of states of the United States|Area
